Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: There are many tips for different topics in the world. Do they all work and deserve attention? In our daily Top 10 collection there is always a place for the most interesting things: facts, stories, tips, observations. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:

The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
